languages.text: "Как и Вигдис он — пустотнорожденный, мутант. И он слишком тесно сплетен с системами корабля, что дает много возможностей для саботажа. Кроме того, его манера общения выходит за рамки устава..." {n}Иокаста морщится.{/n} "Но нельзя отрицать самоотверженность Равора на его посту".

"Like Vigdis, he is a voidborn mutant. And he is too tightly woven into the ship's systems, which provides plenty of opportunities for sabotage. Moreover, his manner of address violates the ship's regulations..." {n}She frowns.{/n} "But Ravor's dedication to his post cannot be denied."
languages.original_text: "Как и Вигдис он — пустотнорожденный, мутант. И он слишком тесно сплетен с системами корабля, что дает много возможностей для саботажа. Кроме того, его манера общения выходит за рамки устава..." {n}Иокаста морщится.{/n} "Но нельзя отрицать самоотверженность Равора на его посту".

traits.locale_text: "Like Vigdis, he is a voidborn mutant. And he is too tightly woven into the ship's systems, which provides plenty of opportunities for sabotage. Moreover, his manner of address violates the Officer's Regulations..." {n}Jocasta frowns.{/n} "But Ravor's dedication to his post cannot be denied."

"Like Vigdis, he is a voidborn mutant. And he is too tightly woven into the ship's systems, which provides plenty of opportunities for sabotage. Moreover, his manner of address violates the Officer's Regulations..." {n}Jocasta frowns.{/n} "But Ravor's dedication to his post cannot be denied."

"Like Vigdis, he is a voidborn mutant. And he is too tightly woven into the ship's systems, which provides plenty of opportunities for sabotage. Moreover, his manner of address violates the ship's regulations..." {n}She frowns.{/n} "But Ravor's dedication to his post cannot be denied."

"Like Vigdis, he is a voidborn mutant. And he is too tightly woven into the ship's systems, which provides plenty of opportunities for sabotage. Moreover, his manner of address violates the ship's regulations..." {n}She frowns.{/n} "But Ravor's dedication to his post cannot be denied."

languages.text: « Tout comme Vigdis, c'est un mutant né du vide. Et il est trop étroitement lié aux systèmes du vaisseau, ce qui lui laisse la voie libre à toute tentative de sabotage. Sa manière de s'adresser à vous, également, est contraire au règlement du vaisseau... {n}dit-elle en fronçant les sourcils.{/n} Mais l'on ne peut nier qu'il est entièrement dévoué à son poste. »
languages.original_text: "Like Vigdis, he is a voidborn mutant. And he is too tightly woven into the ship's systems, which provides plenty of opportunities for sabotage. Moreover, his manner of address violates the ship's regulations..." {n}She frowns.{/n} "But Ravor's dedication to his post cannot be denied."

traits.locale_text: « Tout comme Vigdis, c'est un mutant né du vide. Et il est trop étroitement lié aux systèmes du vaisseau, ce qui lui laisse la voie libre à toute tentative de sabotage. Sa manière de s'adresser à vous, également, est contraire au règlement du vaisseau... {n}dit-elle en fronçant les sourcils.{/n} Mais l'on ne peut nier qu'il est entièrement dévoué à son poste. »

languages.text: «Al igual que Vigdis, es un mutante nacido en el vacío. Y está demasiado ligado a los sistemas de la nave, lo que le proporciona multitud de oportunidades de sabotaje. Además, su forma de hablar contraviene las regulaciones de la nave...». {n}Frunce el ceño.{/n} «Pero la dedicación de Ravor a su puesto es innegable».
languages.original_text: "Like Vigdis, he is a voidborn mutant. And he is too tightly woven into the ship's systems, which provides plenty of opportunities for sabotage. Moreover, his manner of address violates the ship's regulations..." {n}She frowns.{/n} "But Ravor's dedication to his post cannot be denied."

traits.locale_text: «Al igual que Vigdis, es un mutante nacido en el vacío. Y está demasiado ligado a los sistemas de la nave, lo que le proporciona multitud de oportunidades de sabotaje. Además, su forma de hablar contraviene las regulaciones de la nave...». {n}Frunce el ceño.{/n} «Pero la dedicación de Ravor a su puesto es innegable».

languages.text: “他和维格迪斯一样，生来是虚空之子，而且他与虚空舰的系统本身联系过于紧密，这会给内部破坏提供很多机会。不仅如此，他对您说话的态度也违反了船上的规定……”{n}她皱起了眉。{/n}“不过，雷沃对这艘船的巨大贡献不容置疑。”
languages.original_text: "Like Vigdis, he is a voidborn mutant. And he is too tightly woven into the ship's systems, which provides plenty of opportunities for sabotage. Moreover, his manner of address violates the ship's regulations..." {n}She frowns.{/n} "But Ravor's dedication to his post cannot be denied."

traits.locale_text: “他和维格迪斯一样，生来是虚空之子，而且他与虚空舰的系统本身联系过于紧密，这会给内部破坏提供很多机会。不仅如此，他对您说话的态度也违反了船上的规定……”{n}她皱起了眉。{/n}“不过，雷沃对这艘船的巨大贡献不容置疑。”

languages.text: 「ヴィグディスと同じように、彼は虚空生まれの変異体だ。そして、彼は船の組織内にあまりにも入り込んでいるため、妨害工作の機会は沢山あるだろう。さらに言えば、彼の話し方は船の規則に違反している…」{n}彼女は顔をしかめた。{/n} 「しかし、ラヴォールの役職への献身的な態度は否定できない」
languages.original_text: "Like Vigdis, he is a voidborn mutant. And he is too tightly woven into the ship's systems, which provides plenty of opportunities for sabotage. Moreover, his manner of address violates the ship's regulations..." {n}She frowns.{/n} "But Ravor's dedication to his post cannot be denied."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴィグディスと同じように、彼は虚空生まれの変異体だ。そして、彼は船の組織内にあまりにも入り込んでいるため、妨害工作の機会は沢山あるだろう。さらに言えば、彼の話し方は船の規則に違反している…」{n}彼女は顔をしかめた。{/n} 「しかし、ラヴォールの役職への献身的な態度は否定できない」

languages.text: "Genau wie Vigdis ist er ein Mutant, ein Kind der Leere. Und er ist zu eng mit den Systemen des Schiffs verwoben, was reichlich Gelegenheiten zur Sabotage bietet. Obendrein verstößt seine Anrede gegen die Vorschriften des Schiffs ..." {n}Sie runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Doch Ravor erfüllt seine Pflicht mit Hingabe, das lässt sich nicht leugnen."
languages.original_text: "Like Vigdis, he is a voidborn mutant. And he is too tightly woven into the ship's systems, which provides plenty of opportunities for sabotage. Moreover, his manner of address violates the ship's regulations..." {n}She frowns.{/n} "But Ravor's dedication to his post cannot be denied."

traits.locale_text: "Genau wie Vigdis ist er ein Mutant, ein Kind der Leere. Und er ist zu eng mit den Systemen des Schiffs verwoben, was reichlich Gelegenheiten zur Sabotage bietet. Obendrein verstößt seine Anrede gegen die Vorschriften des Schiffs ..." {n}Sie runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Doch Ravor erfüllt seine Pflicht mit Hingabe, das lässt sich nicht leugnen."

languages.text: "Vigdis gibi o da uçsuzdoğan bir mutant. Geminin sistemleriyle fazlasıyla sıkı fıkı bir ilişki içinde, bu da ona bol miktarda sabotaj olanağı sağlıyor. Ayrıca hitap şekli, geminin yönetmeliklerini ihlal ediyor." {n}Kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Ancak Ravor'un mevkisine olan adanmışlığı inkâr edilemez."
languages.original_text: "Like Vigdis, he is a voidborn mutant. And he is too tightly woven into the ship's systems, which provides plenty of opportunities for sabotage. Moreover, his manner of address violates the ship's regulations..." {n}She frowns.{/n} "But Ravor's dedication to his post cannot be denied."
